tasks.title: Project Setup & Configuration
tasks.description: Initialize Flutter project with required dependencies and architecture setup

subtasks.title: Update pubspec.yaml dependencies
subtasks.description: Add state management, database, Firebase, and other required packages

subtasks.title: Create project folder structure
subtasks.description: Set up lib/ folders: models, screens, widgets, services, utils

subtasks.title: Setup SQLite database schema
subtasks.description: Create database helper with Habits, HabitProgress, Pomodoro, PomodoroHistory tables

subtasks.title: Configure state management
subtasks.description: Set up Provider/Riverpod for app-wide state management

tasks.title: App Launch & Splash Screen
tasks.description: Step 1: Create app launch flow with splash screen and first-time user detection

subtasks.title: Create splash screen widget
subtasks.description: App logo, branding, loading animation

subtasks.title: Implement first-time user detection
subtasks.description: Check local storage for app initialization flag

subtasks.title: Setup navigation routing
subtasks.description: Route to Intro (new users) or Home (returning users)

tasks.title: Intro Screen Implementation
tasks.description: Step 2: Create onboarding screen following introdesign.json exactly

subtasks.title: Parse introdesign.json specifications
subtasks.description: Extract colors, typography, layout specs from design file

subtasks.title: Create intro screen UI components
subtasks.description: Welcome message, feature highlights, swipeable cards

subtasks.title: Implement skip and get started actions
subtasks.description: Navigation to Add Habit screen, set intro completion flag

tasks.title: Add Habit Screen Implementation
tasks.description: Step 3: Create habit creation form following add_habit_design.json exactly

subtasks.title: Create habit input form UI
subtasks.description: Name, category, priority, duration fields following design

subtasks.title: Implement date pickers
subtasks.description: Start date, end date, reminder time pickers

subtasks.title: Add repetition pattern selector
subtasks.description: Daily, weekly, monthly, custom interval options

subtasks.title: Implement notification settings
subtasks.description: Toggle switches for notifications and alarms

subtasks.title: Add form validation and save
subtasks.description: Validate inputs, save to database, return to home

tasks.title: Home Screen Implementation
tasks.description: Step 4: Create main dashboard following home_design.json exactly

subtasks.title: Create home screen layout
subtasks.description: Header, today's habits list, navigation elements

subtasks.title: Implement habit cards
subtasks.description: Habit display cards with completion toggles and progress

subtasks.title: Add quick stats summary
subtasks.description: Mini dashboard with key metrics display

subtasks.title: Implement habit completion logic
subtasks.description: Toggle buttons, streak calculation, progress persistence

subtasks.title: Add navigation drawer integration
subtasks.description: Menu sidebar access and navigation routing

tasks.title: Statistics Screen Implementation
tasks.description: Step 5: Create analytics dashboard following statistic_design.json exactly

subtasks.title: Create statistics dashboard UI
subtasks.description: Counters for total, completed, missed habits

subtasks.title: Implement habit statistics graph
subtasks.description: Line/bar/pie charts for trend analysis

subtasks.title: Add completion rate calculations
subtasks.description: Percentage-based success metrics and display

subtasks.title: Create category breakdown view
subtasks.description: Grouped statistics by habit category

tasks.title: Habit Details Screen Implementation
tasks.description: Step 6: Create detailed habit view following Habit_details.json exactly

subtasks.title: Create habit details layout
subtasks.description: Header with habit name, category, description

subtasks.title: Display performance metrics
subtasks.description: Current streak, highest streak, completion rate, totals

subtasks.title: Add calendar view
subtasks.description: Mini calendar showing habit completion history

subtasks.title: Implement edit/delete actions
subtasks.description: Edit navigation, delete confirmation, share progress

tasks.title: Add Pomodoro Screen Implementation
tasks.description: Step 7: Create pomodoro creation form following pomodaro_design.json exactly

subtasks.title: Create pomodoro form UI
subtasks.description: Task name, work/break durations, session count

subtasks.title: Add duration pickers
subtasks.description: Work duration, break duration, long break settings

subtasks.title: Implement notification settings
subtasks.description: Alert preferences, auto-start toggle

subtasks.title: Add save and navigation
subtasks.description: Store pomodoro config, navigate to timer screen

tasks.title: Pomodoro Timer Screen Implementation
tasks.description: Step 8: Create timer interface following pomodaro_design.json exactly

subtasks.title: Create timer display UI
subtasks.description: Large countdown timer, session indicator, progress ring

subtasks.title: Implement timer logic
subtasks.description: Countdown functionality, session management, break automation

subtasks.title: Add control buttons
subtasks.description: Start/pause, stop, skip, reset functionality

subtasks.title: Create session history
subtasks.description: Completed sessions log, focus time tracking

tasks.title: Notification Screen Implementation

subtasks.title: Create notification list UI
subtasks.description: Notification cards with timestamps, read/unread status

subtasks.title: Implement notification history
subtasks.description: Store and display habit/pomodoro notification history

subtasks.title: Add interaction features
subtasks.description: Mark as read, clear all, deep linking to habits

tasks.title: Menu Sidebar Implementation

subtasks.description: User stats summary, navigation menu items

subtasks.title: Implement navigation items
subtasks.description: Home, Habits, Statistics, Pomodoro, History, Settings links

subtasks.title: Add drawer animation
subtasks.description: Smooth slide animation, active item highlighting

subtasks.title: Add pomodoro history

subtasks.title: Implement search and export
